content:
I’m a data analyst and social scientist driven by intellectual curiosity to deliver evidence-based insights that enable public sector organisations to better serve their constituents.
With subject expertise in political science and leadership experience in higher education, I bring a bring a keen eye for research design as well as the ability to cultivate effective cross-functional teams and communicate complex ideas to diverse audiences.
To learn more about my background and work, please check out my bio, CV, and project portfolio below.

summary: Using advanced Excel functions, SQL queries, and Tableau dashboards for exploratory data analysis, I generated business intelligence for a global supermarket's targeted advertising campaign.
title: Descriptive Analytics for a Targeted Advertising Campaign

summary: Using the Beautiful Soup package, I put together a Python script that scrapes exchange rates from HMRC webpages and exports them to a csv file.
title: Scraping Exchange Rates from HMRC Webpages
